blog.quote: He got into one of the boats belonging to Simon Luke 5:3 NIV
blog.title: When Jesus Comes on Board
blog.btext:
One day Jesus saw

Some bold paragraph text.

'Husbands, love your wives, as Christ loved the church...' Ephesians 5:25 ESV

at the waters edge two boats, left there by the fishermen, who were washing their nets. He got into one of the boats like Peter Because You say so
